S. Georgia and S. Sandwich Isls.

feed_product_type.label: Product Sub-type
feed_product_type.definition: A category that best describes the class of product. Values must be chosen from the list in the Valid Values worksheet.
feed_product_type.accepted_value: Select a valid value from drop down

item_sku.label: Seller SKU
item_sku.definition: A unique identifier for the product, assigned by the merchant.  The SKU must be unique for each product listed.  After you have established a SKU for a product, please do not change it without first deleting the original SKU from our systems through a delete feed.
item_sku.accepted_value: Unique Identifier. If you don't enter a SKU we'll create one for you.

brand_name.label: Brand Name
brand_name.definition: The brand or manufacturer of the product.
brand_name.accepted_value: Name of the brand under which products are sold. Usually mentioned on product or package. In case name is not mentioned, kindly use "Generic" as brand name

part_number.label: Manufacturer Part Number
part_number.definition: If applicable, please submit the manufacturer's part number for the product.
part_number.accepted_value: For most products, this will be identical to the model number or SKU; However, some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number.

external_product_id.label: Product ID
external_product_id.definition: A standard, alphanumeric string that uniquely identifies the product. This could be a GCID (16 alphanumeric characters), UPC or EAN. This is a required field if product_id_type is provided.
external_product_id.accepted_value: Provide the external ID (numerical barcode mentioned on the product/packaging) type and corresponding value that is being used to identify the product. This can be an EAN, UPC, ISBN or ASIN.

external_product_id_type.label: Product ID Type
external_product_id_type.definition: The type of standard, unique identifier entered in the Product_ID field. This is a required field if Product_ID is provided.
external_product_id_type.accepted_value: Select one of the following options: GCID, UPC, EAN ASIN or ISBN

item_name.label: Item Name (aka Title)
item_name.definition: A short title for the product. This will be displayed in bold on the product page and in the title bar of the browser window.
item_name.accepted_value: An alphanumeric string up to 200 characters.

product_description.label: Product Description
product_description.definition: Text - maximum 2000 characters. HTML tags and special characters not on a standard keyboard (eg. ®, ©, ™ or other Type 1 High ASCII characters) are not supported. Do not use email IDs, phone numbers, external URLs or promotional messages such as 'sale', 'price', 'offer' etc
product_description.accepted_value: Text - maximum 2000 characters. HTML tags and special characters not on a standard keyboard (eg. ®, ©, ™ or other Type 1 High ASCII characters) are not supported. Do not use email IDs, phone numbers, external URLs or promotional messages such as 'sale', 'price', 'offer' etc
product_description.example: This beautifully handcrafted dress by newcomer designer Sugar will make you the star of this summer's garden parties. It features a butterfly embroidery on the front, a zip on the back and is made from 100% organic cotton.

recommended_browse_nodes.label: Recommended Browse Nodes
recommended_browse_nodes.definition:
This determines what browse node the item will be assigned to. Always use this field to make your product discoverable to customers.  Please consult the Browse Tree Guide LINK for the best value to use for your product.

you can find the browse tree guide (BTG) here in https://sellercentral.amazon.in/gp/help/help-page.html/ref=ag_1661_cont_scsearch?ie=UTF8&itemID=1661
recommended_browse_nodes.accepted_value: Indicate the browse node or section of the Amazon website where the product will be assigned. This allows customers to find the product on the website easily. Browse Tree Guide can be downloaded from https://sellercentral.amazon.in/gp/help/help-popup.html/?itemID=1641

closure_type.label: Closure Type
closure_type.definition: The closure type of pants, jeans and shorts. Choose from valid values.
closure_type.accepted_value: Select a value from the Valid Values worksheet.

model_name.label: Model Name
model_name.definition: The model name for the product.
model_name.accepted_value: An alphanumeric string up to a maximum of 50 characters in length.

care_instructions.label: Product Care Instructions
care_instructions.definition: The care instructions as found on the item of clothing.
care_instructions.accepted_value: An alphanumeric string up to a maximum of 100 characters in length.

bullet_point1.label: Bullet Point
bullet_point1.definition: Text - maximum 100 characters. HTML tags and special characters not on a standard keyboard (eg. ®, ©, ™ or other Type 1 High ASCII characters) are not supported. Do not use email IDs, phone numbers, external URLs or promotional messages such as 'sale', 'price', 'offer' etc. Do not include any formatting - Amazon will add the bullet points
bullet_point1.accepted_value: Text - maximum 100 characters. HTML tags and special characters not on a standard keyboard (eg. ®, ©, ™ or other Type 1 High ASCII characters) are not supported. Do not use email IDs, phone numbers, external URLs or promotional messages such as 'sale', 'price', 'offer' etc. Do not include any formatting - Amazon will add the bullet points
bullet_point1.example: Pants feature front pleats, cuffed legs, and 2 back slit pockets with button closures

bullet_point2.label: Bullet Point
bullet_point2.definition: Text - maximum 100 characters. HTML tags and special characters not on a standard keyboard (eg. ®, ©, ™ or other Type 1 High ASCII characters) are not supported. Do not use email IDs, phone numbers, external URLs or promotional messages such as 'sale', 'price', 'offer' etc. Do not include any formatting - Amazon will add the bullet points

bullet_point5.example: Pants feature front pleats, cuffed legs, and 2 back slit pockets with button closures

style_name.label: Style Name
style_name.definition: Describes a style such as "Boot Cut" for Jeans, "Halterneck" for Tops, "Duffle" for Outerwear . Valid values are given and differ depending on the clothing type. Choose from applicable valid values list.
style_name.accepted_value: Select a value from the Valid Values worksheet.

color_map.label: Colour Map
color_map.definition: Always use this field for the color of your item, it will enable the color filter used by customers. Values must be chosen from the list in the Valid Values worksheet.
color_map.accepted_value: Select a value from the Valid Values worksheet.

material_type.label: Material Type
material_type.accepted_value: Specify the primary materials used for manufacturing the item

rise_style.label: Rise Style
rise_style.definition: Indicate the style of clothing designed to sit low on, or below, the hips. Select from list of valid values.
rise_style.accepted_value: Indicate the style of clothing designed to sit low on, or below, the hips. Select from list of valid values.

color_name.label: Color
color_name.definition: The original colour name of the product.
color_name.accepted_value: Mention the primary or prominent color of the product. Mention "multicolor" if there are more than one color

department_name.label: Gender
department_name.definition: The department of clothing (men's, women's, etc.) in which the product is found.
department_name.accepted_value: Department refers to the gender which the product would be most suitable for(e.g: Male, Female, Unisex)

size_name.label: Size
size_name.definition: The original size name of the product. Please use the local size for the Marketplace you are selling on.
size_name.accepted_value: Mention the numeric or text version of the item's size. (e.g: Small, Medium, Large, 40, 42, 44, etc.)

lifecycle_supply_type.label: Product Lifecycle Supply Type
lifecycle_supply_type.accepted_value: Specify the intended supply method for the item

country_of_origin.label: Country/Region Of Origin
country_of_origin.definition: The country where the product was issued.
country_of_origin.accepted_value: Specify the country/region where the product was issued.

fabric_type.label: Fabric Type
fabric_type.accepted_value: List all fabrics separated by ','. Indicate with % composition. Always add "Viscose" or "Rayon" instead of "Bamboo", and "Azlon" for Soy

external_product_information.label: HSN Code
external_product_information.definition: Provide the applicable 6/8 digit HSN tax code for your product.
external_product_information.accepted_value: Provide the applicable 6/8 digit HSN tax code for your product.

supplier_declared_material_regulation1.label: Material/Fabric Regulations
supplier_declared_material_regulation1.accepted_value: Does your product contain any of the following materials/fabrics subject to regulation: Bamboo, Wool, and/or Fur? Please select all that apply. If none apply, select not applicable.

supplier_declared_material_regulation2.label: Material/Fabric Regulations
supplier_declared_material_regulation2.accepted_value: Does your product contain any of the following materials/fabrics subject to regulation: Bamboo, Wool, and/or Fur? Please select all that apply. If none apply, select not applicable.

supplier_declared_material_regulation3.label: Material/Fabric Regulations
supplier_declared_material_regulation3.accepted_value: Does your product contain any of the following materials/fabrics subject to regulation: Bamboo, Wool, and/or Fur? Please select all that apply. If none apply, select not applicable.

standard_price.label: Your price
standard_price.definition: A price greater than 0.  Do not include thousands separators or currency symbols.
standard_price.accepted_value: Standard Price indicates the price at which product is sold to customers. Please do not use commas or currency signs

quantity.label: Quantity
quantity.definition:
Merchant-fulfilled products: Enter the quantity of the item you are making available for sale.  This is your current INVENTORY commitment.  Quantity is required for all "child" or stand-alone items. If left blank when first submitting the product information, the item will be displayed as "Out of stock."  Do not enter quantity for parent items.
Amazon-fulfilled products: Do not enter quantity, as it is not applicable for products fulfilled by Amazon.  Instead, submit fulfillment_center_id in a separate column (see data definition for details).

number_of_items.label: Number of Items
number_of_items.definition: The number of items that are included in the product

list_price_with_tax.label: List Price
list_price_with_tax.definition: Manufacturer's suggested retail price or list price for the product. This is not the same as the offering price, which is specified in the item-price field.
list_price_with_tax.accepted_value: The M.R.P. of the product, in local currency.

maximum_retail_price.label: Maximum Retail Price
maximum_retail_price.definition: This is the maximum retail price that is physically printed on pre-packaged products by manufacturer according to legal metrology act. This is the maximum price that seller can charge a customer.  This attribute is only applicable to IN marketplace.
maximum_retail_price.accepted_value: Maximum Retail Price (MRP) indicates the price mentioned on the product or package. This is the highest price at which the product can be sold to the customer. Please do not use commas or currency signs

main_image_url.label: Main Image URL
main_image_url.definition: The URL where a main image of the product is located.  It's important that this is supplied for all products.
main_image_url.accepted_value: Images should have 72-pixels-per-inch resolution and be 500 pixels minimum in length (on the longest side). The preferred file format is JPEG (.jpg), and the URL must be fully-formed and valid (i.e., include http://). When naming your image, you may use the following convention (though not required): Product SKU + View Indicator (.main) + File Extension (.jpg). An example would be: "15774.main.jpg".  There cannot be any spaces or high ASCII characters in the image URL.  Save the image to your Web server and supply the URL to the image in this field.  Accepted formats are .jpeg, .jpg, and .gif

bottoms_body_type.label: Bottoms Body Type
bottoms_body_type.definition: Provide the body type for the bottoms.
bottoms_body_type.accepted_value: Provide the body type for apparel item, select "Regular" in case of no special body type.

target_gender.label: Target Gender
target_gender.definition: Select one of the follownig options: Female, Male, Unisex
target_gender.accepted_value: Select one of the follownig options: Female, Male, Unisex

age_range_description.label: Age Range Description
age_range_description.definition: Select one of the following options: Adult, Kids, Baby
age_range_description.accepted_value: Select one of the following options: Adult, Kids, Baby

bottoms_size_system.label: Bottoms Size System
bottoms_size_system.definition: Provide the size system for the apparel bottoms.
bottoms_size_system.accepted_value: Provide the size system for the apparel bottoms.

bottoms_size_class.label: Bottoms Size Class
bottoms_size_class.definition: Provide the size class for the apparel bottoms.
bottoms_size_class.accepted_value: Provide the size class for the apparel bottoms.

bottoms_size.label: Bottoms Size Value
bottoms_size.definition: Provide the size value associated with the size system and size class.
bottoms_size.accepted_value: Provide the size value associated with the size system and size class.

bottoms_size_to.label: Bottoms Size To Range
bottoms_size_to.definition: Provide the size to value associated with the size system and size class when the size is a range.
bottoms_size_to.accepted_value: Provide the to size value (if range), must be greater than the size value.

other_image_url1.label: Other Image URL1
other_image_url1.definition:
The URL for additional images of your product.

These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.  For example, you can use this field to show the label information or packaging of your product. Upload additional images with different views to the item, or with some emotional surrounding as additional image.
other_image_url1.accepted_value:
A valid URL, including leading "http://"

The URL is case sensitive, so make sure to use matching capitalisation and no redirections (e.g. .jpeg instead of .jpg). While a web browser might be smart enough to locate your image despite of these little inaccuracies, our image collection process isn't.

swatch_image_url.label: Swatch Image URL
swatch_image_url.definition: The URL where an image of a colour swatch from the product is located.
swatch_image_url.accepted_value: Images should have 72-pixels-per-inch resolution and be 30 pixels maximum length (on the longest side). The preferred file format is JPEG (.jpg). When naming your image, please use the following convention: Product SKU + View Indicator (i.e., .swatch) + File Extension (i.e., .jpg). An example would be: "15774.swatch.jpg". Save the image to your Web server and supply the URL to the image in this field.

parent_child.label: Parentage
parent_child.definition:
Defines the product within a relationship with another, similar product.  

The "parent" defines the basic data about the product. Parent products are not purchasable; the "parent" product simply specifies the attributes of the product that are common among all of its children and only acts as a place holder.  The "child" products define the possible variations (i.e., size, colour) of the parent product and represent the items that are actually for sale.

This field is required if any of the following columns are populated: variation_theme, color, paper_size, maximum_expandable_size, line_size.  If the product does not participate in a variation relationship, use the value "child."

For further information about how to construct a product variation, please refer to this template's "Example" tab.
parent_child.accepted_value:
Please select one of the following values: 

parent
child

parent_sku.label: Parent SKU
parent_sku.definition: If the product is a child product, list the SKU of the parent product which is related.  DO NOT FILL IN THIS FIELD FOR PARENT PRODUCTS.
parent_sku.accepted_value: An alphanumeric string; 1 character minimum in length and 40 characters maximum in length.

relationship_type.label: Relationship Type
relationship_type.definition: Describes the relationship between products that are related. Accessories can be seen on the www.amazon.co.uk site as "Also Recommended" selections on certain detail product pages.  Use this field to create an accessory relationship.
relationship_type.accepted_value:
Select one of the following options: 
Accessory                                                                      Variation

variation_theme.label: Variation Theme
variation_theme.definition: Describes the parameter(s) by which the parent product may vary.  The value input for this field should be the same for both the parent and child SKUs. Example: If the product varies by size, input the value Size. If the product varies by colour, input the value Color.   Terms used for variation themes are created by you the merchant. (e.g. 'count' can be any number that you choose).

update_delete.label: Update Delete
update_delete.definition:
Specifies the type of operation (Update, PartialUpdate or Delete) to be done on the data provided. If left blank, the default behaviour is "Update."  Use "Update" whenever you are changing any field in the existing product's information, including reducing the inventory to 0.  Only use "Delete" when you wish to remove a product completely and permanently from the catalogue. 

After you have established a SKU for a product, please do not try changing it without first deleting the associated product from our systems through a delete feed.
update_delete.accepted_value: Select one of the following options: Update, PartialUpdate, or Delete.

manufacturer.label: Manufacturer
manufacturer.accepted_value: Specify the manufacturer of the product as mentioned on the product or package

model.label: Model Number
model.definition: If applicable, please submit the manufacturer's model number for the product.
model.accepted_value: Provide the manufacturer 's model number for the item

generic_keywords.label: Search Terms
generic_keywords.definition: Search terms that describe your product: no repetition, no competitor brand names or ASINs.
generic_keywords.accepted_value: Search terms that describe your product: no repetition, no competitor brand names or ASINs.

is_autographed.label: Is Autographed
is_autographed.definition: Indicate whether or not your item is autographed
is_autographed.accepted_value: Select 'true' if your product is autographed.  If your product is not autographed, you may leave this field blank.

packer_contact_information.label: Packer
packer_contact_information.accepted_value: If Packer is different from manufacturer, provide address and contact number of the packer. If manufacturer is the packer, provide address and contact number of the manufacturer.
packer_contact_information.example: ABC Packers, Industrial Estate, Mumbai, India. Customer Care 000 999 999999

special_features1.label: Special Features

special_features1.accepted_value: Provide any special features an item has that distinguish it from other, comparable products

special_features2.definition: describes the top's special feature. Choose from valid values list.
special_features2.accepted_value: Provide any special features an item has that distinguish it from other, comparable products

special_features5.accepted_value: Provide any special features an item has that distinguish it from other, comparable products

item_type_name.label: Item Type Name

item_type_name.accepted_value: Provide the generic name for you Product (example For 'Vaseline' Item Type name is 'Petroleum Jelly').

occasion_type2.definition: A word that defines the occasion for which the clothing can be worn. Choose from the valid values list.
occasion_type2.accepted_value: Select a value from the Valid Values worksheet.

occasion_type3.definition: A word that defines the occasion for which the clothing can be worn. Choose from the valid values list.
occasion_type3.accepted_value: Select a value from the Valid Values worksheet.

occasion_type5.definition: A word that defines the occasion for which the clothing can be worn. Choose from the valid values list.
occasion_type5.accepted_value: Select a value from the Valid Values worksheet.

sport_type1.label: Sport Type
sport_type1.accepted_value: Provide any specific sports with which the item is designed to be used

sport_type2.label: Sport Type
sport_type2.accepted_value: Provide any specific sports with which the item is designed to be used

belt_style.label: Belt Style
belt_style.definition: Describes the style of a belt
belt_style.accepted_value: Describes the style of a belt

subject_character.label: character
subject_character.definition: Describes cartoon, movie, etc. character of costume.
subject_character.accepted_value: An alphanumeric text string; 1 character minimum and 50 characters maximum. If multiple colors are available, a unique record should be submitted for each product.

seasons.label: Season
seasons.definition: Select the value that best describes the season associated with the product.
seasons.accepted_value: Select from the list of valid values

pattern_type.label: Pattern
pattern_type.definition: Select the value that best describes the pattern of the product. If the product is a "Child" product of a "Parent" product with a Variation Theme of or including PATTERN_NAME, you must provide a value for Pattern.

athlete.label: Athlete
athlete.accepted_value: Name of athlete participating in the event

collection_name.label: Collection

importer_contact_information.label: Importer

duration.label: Duration
duration.accepted_value: Provide the amount of time that the product can be used for or is expected to complete

lifestyle.label: Lifestyle

manufacturer_contact_information.label: Manufacturer Contact
manufacturer_contact_information.definition: Address and Customer Care Details of the manufacturer, or where the manufacturer is not the packer, the address and customer care details of the manufacturer and packer

manufacturer_contact_information.example: ABC Manufacturer, Industrial Estate, Mumbai, India. Customer Care 000 999 999999

fur_description.label: Fur Description
fur_description.accepted_value: Specify a description of the item's fur.  If item contains real fur, include fur origin country. If the fur is dyed/colored, used, damaged, or contains paws, bellies, tails or waste please indicate as such

front_style.label: Front Style
front_style.definition: Front Pleat Type. Please refer to valid values.

theme.label: Theme
theme.accepted_value: Specify the theme of the product. Very similar to subject, but with more general use cases

league_name.label: League Name

special_size_type.label: Special Sizes
special_size_type.definition: Indicates the specialty sizing for specific products.
special_size_type.accepted_value: Any size modifier appropriate to the product. (Refer to the list of valid values)

included_components1.label: Included Item(s)
included_components1.definition: Specify the item(s) included with the product, e.g. accessories, free gifts.
included_components1.accepted_value: A text string up to 50 characters.

included_components2.label: Included Item(s)
included_components2.definition: Specify the item(s) included with the product, e.g. accessories, free gifts.
included_components2.accepted_value: A text string up to 50 characters.

included_components3.label: Included Item(s)
included_components3.definition: Specify the item(s) included with the product, e.g. accessories, free gifts.

included_components4.definition: Specify the item(s) included with the product, e.g. accessories, free gifts.

included_components5.definition: Specify the item(s) included with the product, e.g. accessories, free gifts.

item_booking_date.label: Item Booking Date
item_booking_date.accepted_value: Provide the date a vendor must receive a PO in order to deliver goods to Amazon by a specified date using YYYY-MM-DD format

material_features.label: Material Features
material_features.accepted_value: Enter unique features for the item relative to the material of construction
material_features.example: Compostable, biodegradable, Is food safe, Fragrance free, Plant based, etc.

leg_style.label: Leg Style
leg_style.definition: The cut or shape of the pant leg.

fabric_wash.label: Denim wash degree
fabric_wash.definition: For denim, indicates whether the wash is light, medium or dark. Choose from valid values.
fabric_wash.accepted_value: Select a value from the Valid Values worksheet.

website_shipping_weight.label: Shipping Weight
website_shipping_weight.definition: The weight of the product when packaged to ship. This is displayed on the product page and used to calculate shipping costs for weight-based shipping, if available.
website_shipping_weight.accepted_value: A number with up to 10 digits to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Please do not use commas.

website_shipping_weight_unit_of_measure.label: Website Shipping Weight Unit Of Measure
website_shipping_weight_unit_of_measure.definition: Specify the unit of measurement for your Weight field
website_shipping_weight_unit_of_measure.accepted_value: Select one of the following options: GR, or KG . Do not include the actual weight, which will be collected in the shipping-weight field.

item_volume.label: Item Volume
item_volume.definition: Indicates the volume capacity of a product.
item_volume.accepted_value: A number with up to 10 digits to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Please do not use commas.

item_volume_unit_of_measure.label: Item Volume Unit Of Measure
item_volume_unit_of_measure.definition: Indicates the volume capacity of a product.
item_volume_unit_of_measure.accepted_value: Indicates the volume capacity of a product.

inseam_length.label: Jeans length (inches)
inseam_length.definition: The inseam length in inches of Jeans. Choose from valid size values.
inseam_length.accepted_value: Select a value from the Sizes worksheet.

item_width_unit_of_measure.label: Item Width Unit Of Measure
item_width_unit_of_measure.definition: Select the unit of measure for Item Width. If Item Width is used, you must also enter the Item Width Unit Of Measure.
item_width_unit_of_measure.accepted_value: Select from the list of valid values.

inseam_length_unit_of_measure.label: Jeans length unit of measure
inseam_length_unit_of_measure.definition: Needs to be filled if you have filled inseam-length.
inseam_length_unit_of_measure.accepted_value:
Select one of the following:
CM
IN

rise_height.label: Rise Height
rise_height.accepted_value: Provide the rise height for the item as a number

size_map.label: Size Map
size_map.definition: Always use this field for the size of your item, it will enable the size filter used by customers. Values must be chosen from the list in the Valid Values worksheet.
size_map.accepted_value: Select a value from the Valid Values worksheet.

unit_count.label: Unit Count
unit_count.definition: Indicate the number count of a specific product. Skeins of yarn, tubes of paint, and so on. Rarely used in the Toy or Baby category.
unit_count.accepted_value: provide the number of units in the product.

item_length_description.label: Item Length Description
item_length_description.definition: The length of the product. Please refer to valid values.
item_length_description.accepted_value: The length of the product. Please refer to valid values.

item_height_unit_of_measure.label: Item Height Unit Of Measure
item_height_unit_of_measure.definition: Select the unit of measure for Item Height. If Item Height is used, you must also enter the Item Height Unit Of Measure.
item_height_unit_of_measure.accepted_value: Select from the list of valid values.

waist_size.label: Jeans width (inches)
waist_size.definition: The waist siz of Jeans in inches. Choose from valid size values.
waist_size.accepted_value: Select a value from the Sizes worksheet.

waist_size_unit_of_measure.label: Waist Size Unit Of Measure
waist_size_unit_of_measure.definition: Needs to be filled if you have filled waist-size.
waist_size_unit_of_measure.accepted_value:
Select one of the following:
CM
IN

unit_count_type.label: Unit Count Type
unit_count_type.definition: Select the unit of measure for PPU Count. If PPU Count is used, you must also enter the PPU Count Unit Of Measure.
unit_count_type.accepted_value: Specify the unit of measure for Unit Count. If Unit Count is used, you must also enter the Unit Count Unit Of Measure.

batteries_required.label: Is this product a battery or does it use batteries?
batteries_required.definition: An internal rechargeable, non-replaceable battery (e.g. laptop battery) is also considered a battery.

are_batteries_included.label: Batteries are Included
are_batteries_included.definition: Select "yes" if batteries are contained in the product (e.g. batteries inside a pair of Bluetooth headphones) and/or included with the product (e.g. batteries packed separately with a camera), otherwise select "no"

battery_type1.label: Battery type/size
battery_type1.definition: Specify the type of battery in the product.
battery_type1.accepted_value: Please refer to the Valid Values worksheet.  Only use this when PowerSource is 'battery'

battery_type2.label: Battery type/size
battery_type2.definition: Specify the type of battery in the product.
battery_type2.accepted_value: Please refer to the Valid Values worksheet.  Only use this when PowerSource is 'battery'

battery_type3.label: Battery type/size
battery_type3.definition: Specify the type of battery in the product.
battery_type3.accepted_value: Please refer to the Valid Values worksheet.  Only use this when PowerSource is 'battery'

number_of_batteries1.label: Number of batteries
number_of_batteries1.definition: Number of batteries, including spares (total batteries, not cells per battery)
number_of_batteries1.accepted_value: Any integer greater than or equal to one

number_of_batteries2.label: Number of batteries
number_of_batteries2.definition: Number of batteries, including spares (total batteries, not cells per battery)
number_of_batteries2.accepted_value: Any integer greater than or equal to one

number_of_batteries3.label: Number of batteries
number_of_batteries3.definition: Number of batteries, including spares (total batteries, not cells per battery)
number_of_batteries3.accepted_value: Any integer greater than or equal to one

number_of_lithium_metal_cells.label: Number of Lithium Metal Cells
number_of_lithium_metal_cells.definition: Total number of Lithium cells (of type Metal) in the product,  where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery.
number_of_lithium_metal_cells.accepted_value: Total number of Lithium cells (of type Metal) in the product,  where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery.

number_of_lithium_ion_cells.label: Number of Lithium-ion Cells
number_of_lithium_ion_cells.definition: Total number of Lithium cells (of type Ion) in the product,  where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery.
number_of_lithium_ion_cells.accepted_value: Total number of Lithium cells (of type Ion) in the product,  where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery.

lithium_battery_packaging.label: Lithium Battery Packaging
lithium_battery_packaging.definition: “Batteries only”: the battery or batteries are sold alone or with items they are not meant to power. “With equipment”: the battery is included in the package but not pre-installed. “In equipment”: the battery is pre-installed in the item.
lithium_battery_packaging.accepted_value: Choices are batteries_only (If battery is a standalone) batteries_contained_in_equipment (if battery is assembled in the item) or batteries_packed_with_equipment (If battery is included in the item packaging but not assembled in the item)

lithium_battery_energy_content.label: Watt hours per battery
lithium_battery_energy_content.definition: Commonly printed on the battery or outer packaging
lithium_battery_energy_content.accepted_value: Watt hrs of each battery (or cell) in unit

lithium_battery_energy_content_unit_of_m.label: Lithium Battery Energy Content Unit Of Measure
lithium_battery_energy_content_unit_of_m.definition: Indicate unit of measure if Lithium Battery Energy Content is populated
lithium_battery_energy_content_unit_of_m.accepted_value: Indicate unit of measure if Lithium Battery Energy Content is populated

lithium_battery_weight.label: Lithium content
lithium_battery_weight.definition: Commonly found in manufacturer's technical information
lithium_battery_weight.accepted_value: A number with up to 10 digits to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Please do not use commas.

lithium_battery_weight_unit_of_measure.label: Lithium Battery Weight Unit Of Measure
lithium_battery_weight_unit_of_measure.definition: Select the unit of measure for Lithium Battery Weight  . If Lithium Battery Weight  is used, you must also enter theLithium Battery Weight  Unit Of Measure.
lithium_battery_weight_unit_of_measure.accepted_value: Select the unit of measure for Lithium Battery Weight  . If Lithium Battery Weight  is used, you must also enter theLithium Battery Weight  Unit Of Measure.

legal_disclaimer_description.label: Legal Disclaimer Description
legal_disclaimer_description.definition: Describes any legal language needed with the product.
legal_disclaimer_description.accepted_value: An alphanumeric string up to a maximum of 500 characters in length.
legal_disclaimer_description.example: For residents of NJ, VT, MA, and MI, must be at least 18 & over to purchase.

safety_warning.label: Safety Warning
safety_warning.definition: Specify safety issues associated with the product.
safety_warning.accepted_value: A text string up to 1,000 characters.

condition_type.label: Condition
condition_type.definition: Select the value that best describes the product's condition.
condition_type.accepted_value: Select from the list of valid values.

condition_note.label: Condition Note
condition_note.definition: Descriptive text explaining the item’s condition. This Condition Note field is limited to 1000 characters for all Used, Collectible, and Refurbished items. Condition notes are not accepted for products with a condition type of new.
condition_note.accepted_value: A text string with a maximum of 1,000 characters. The Condition Note field doesn’t allow special characters.

fulfillment_latency.label: Handling Time
fulfillment_latency.definition: This is time in which you will be able to ship the product after you get an order. The default value is 1 to 2 days. Use this field if your handling time is greater than 2 business days.
fulfillment_latency.accepted_value: This is time in which you will be able to ship the product after you get an order. The default value is 1 to 2 days. Use this field if your handling time is greater than 2 business days.

product_site_launch_date.label: Launch Date
product_site_launch_date.definition: Specify the date the product will be searchable. A product with a future launch date will not be discoverable on the website until the specified launch date.
product_site_launch_date.accepted_value: This is the date when customers will start viewing this product on Amazon.

merchant_release_date.label: Release Date
merchant_release_date.definition: The first date on which you can deliver a pre-orderable product (one that has never been available prior to this date) to a customer
merchant_release_date.accepted_value: This field is used to setup pre-order and is the date from when the pre-ordered product will be available to be shipped to customers.

restock_date.label: Restock Date
restock_date.definition: This is the date that a merchant will be able to ship any back-ordered items to a customer.
restock_date.accepted_value: This field is used to setup back-order and is the date when the back-ordered products will be available for shipping to customers.

product_tax_code.label: Product Tax Code
product_tax_code.definition: amazon.in's standard code to identify the tax properties of a product.
product_tax_code.accepted_value: Enter the product tax code supplied to you by amazon.in.

sale_price.label: Sale Price
sale_price.definition: The sale price at which the merchant offers the product for sale, expressed in local currency.  The site will strikethrough the product's original price and indicate that the item is on sale at the sale price.
sale_price.accepted_value: The price at which you offer the product for sale.

sale_from_date.label: Sale Start Date
sale_from_date.definition: The date that the sale price will begin to override the product's item_price.
sale_from_date.accepted_value: A date in this format: yyyy-mm-dd.

sale_end_date.label: Sale End Date
sale_end_date.definition: The last date that the sale price will override the item's normal price; the product's standard_price will be displayed afterwards.
sale_end_date.accepted_value: A date in this format: yyyy-mm-dd.

max_order_quantity.label: Max Order Quantity
max_order_quantity.definition: Use to indicate the largest quantity that an individual may purchase in one order of the given product.

offering_can_be_gift_messaged.label: Can Be Gift Messaged
offering_can_be_gift_messaged.definition: If you can print a gift message with the item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'false'.
offering_can_be_gift_messaged.accepted_value: If you can print a gift message with the item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'false'.

offering_can_be_giftwrapped.label: Is Gift Wrap Available?
offering_can_be_giftwrapped.definition: If you can gift wrap an item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'FALSE'.

map_price.label: Minimum Advertised Price
map_price.definition: For MAP (Minimum Advertised Price) based pricing.  If you have never heard this term before, this function probably does not apply to you.
map_price.accepted_value: A number with up to 18 digits allowed to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Please do not use commas or currency symbols.

currency.label: Currency
currency.definition: The currency code for price data.  This is required if map, msrp, item_price, or sale_price is provided.  The same currency will apply to all price-related fields.

offering_end_date.label: Offer End Date
offering_end_date.definition: Specify the date when this item can be discontinued on the site.
offering_end_date.accepted_value: This is the date from when customer cannot place an order on your product, irrespective of the stock in hand. But the product still be active, if other Selling Partners are selling this product.

merchant_shipping_group_name.label: Shipping-Template
merchant_shipping_group_name.definition: Sellers can create a series of distribution templates based on business needs and usage. These templates can contain different distribution areas, expected delivery time, and shipping. When you add product information, sellers need to choose the template to be assosciated with the product to control the product availability as well as ship speed and fee to different regions. Customers will be provided the relevant delivery and shipping options based on this information.
merchant_shipping_group_name.accepted_value: The ship configuration group for an offer. The ship configuration group is created and managed by the seller through the ship setting UI.

offering_start_date.label: Offer Start Date
offering_start_date.definition: This is the first date on which a merchant can deliver a pre-orderable product (one that has never been available prior to this date) to a customer.
offering_start_date.accepted_value: Once the product is launched on Amazon, customers can start placing orders on your product from this date.

business_price.label: Business Price
business_price.definition: The price at which the credentialed Amazon Business seller offers the product to verified business customers, expressed in INR. The price should be greater than 0. If price exists, business-price should be less than or equal to price, as business-price represents a discount for business customers. Do not include thousands separators or currency symbols. This field is required if quantity prices are provided
business_price.accepted_value: A business-price greater than 0.  Do not include thousands separators or currency symbols. If price exists, business-price must be less than or equal to price.

quantity_price_type.label: Quantity Price Type
quantity_price_type.definition: Either fixed or percent. When fixed is selected, quantity prices are expressed in INR. When percent is selected, quantity prices are calculated as a percent off of the business price.
quantity_price_type.accepted_value: Either of the following:n- fixedn- percent

quantity_price1.label: Quantity Price 1
quantity_price1.definition: Quantity prices, expressed either as INR (199.99 = INR199.99) or as a percent off the business-price (7= 7% off business-price), depending on the chosen quantity-price type. Must provide a lower-bound for each quantity-price. Each quantity-price must be lower than the previous one.
quantity_price1.accepted_value: The Fixed price or Percent Off discount at which the merchant offers the product for sale if the buyer is purchasing at least the associated quantity, expressed in INR.

quantity_lower_bound1.label: Quantity Lower Bound 1
quantity_lower_bound1.definition: Quantity thresholds, expressed in units. Business customers who purchase at or above a quantity-lower-bound will be given the corresponding quantity-price. For example, if lower-bound1 is set to 50, quantity-price1 will apply to a purchase of 50 or more units. Sellers can specify up to 5 lower-bounds and must provide a quantity-price for each lower bound. Each lower-bound must be higher than the previous one.
quantity_lower_bound1.accepted_value: The minimum purchase quantity necessary to receive the associated Fixed price or Percent Off price

pricing_action.label: Pricing Action
pricing_action.definition:
Specifies the actions that need to be performed on the price attributes of this SKU. The only action currently supported by the system is deleting the business_price.
Set this field to "delete business_price" when you want to remove a previously submitted business_price and any quantity discounts. If left blank, no action will be performed and the contents of this column will be ignored.

unspsc_code.label: United Nations Standard Products and Services Code
unspsc_code.definition: An 8-digit alphanumeric code for classification of products according to the UNSPSC system
unspsc_code.accepted_value: An 8-digit alphanumeric code for classification of products according to the UNSPSC system

national_stock_number.label: National Stock Number
national_stock_number.definition: A alpha-numeric 13 digit code. Code identifying standard material items of supply as defined by NATO
national_stock_number.accepted_value: A alpha-numeric 13 digit code. Code identifying standard material items of supply as defined by NATO

other_image_url1.label: Other Image URL1
other_image_url1.definition:
The URL for additional images of your product.

These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.  For example, you can use this field to show the label information or packaging of your product. Upload additional images with different views to the item, or with some emotional surrounding as additional image.
other_image_url1.accepted_value:
A valid URL, including leading "http://"

The URL is case sensitive, so make sure to use matching capitalisation and no redirections (e.g. .jpeg instead of .jpg). While a web browser might be smart enough to locate your image despite of these little inaccuracies, our image collection process isn't.

swatch_image_url.label: Swatch Image URL
swatch_image_url.definition: The URL where an image of a colour swatch from the product is located.
swatch_image_url.accepted_value: Images should have 72-pixels-per-inch resolution and be 30 pixels maximum length (on the longest side). The preferred file format is JPEG (.jpg). When naming your image, please use the following convention: Product SKU + View Indicator (i.e., .swatch) + File Extension (i.e., .jpg). An example would be: "15774.swatch.jpg". Save the image to your Web server and supply the URL to the image in this field.
